A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a lifelong SW fan\, I am disappointed in the direction given to Luke.  This is not what I dreamed about as a 10 year old kid.  The whole plot of the resistance cruiser being chased while running out of gas was nonsensical.   Poe should have been thrown in the brig or shot for treason.  Finn and Rose have time to go gambling and then fight Phasma while the cruiser is getting blasted.  We find out more about Rose than Smoke?  Seriously?   Not all bad though... space battles were great.  Battle of Crait was very cool.  Mostly though\, I wanted more... knights of ren please!  Somebody called Darth please. Luke fighting please. Smoke backstory.  Rey backstory - Not the one we got. More info on the history of the force.  Instead we got porgs and Luke milking the teats of a sea cow.
